note.p: Birth: Milton, Duncra Hill, East Lothian, Scotland (06 July 1796)
Death: Grazeley Lodge, near Reading, Berkshire (26 May 1872)
Career: Surgeon, Madras Establishment; Superintendent, East Indian Company's cotton plantations at Coimbatore
References: R W Home, 'The Royal Society and the Empire: the colonial and Commonwealth Fellowship. Part 2. After 1847' in NR 2003 vol 57 pp 47-84
